overview: Ask any girl and she's sure to tell you "There's nothing more romantic than Ass-To-Mouth." Thanks to Sal Genoa for capturing some of the most incredible A-2-M's ever seen! But that's not all! Sal doesn't stop with A-2-M's. He also captures (for our enjoyment) an assortment of Double-Penetrations, Ass-to-Mouth, and everyone's "other" favorite, Cum-Swallowing! Stretched sphincters abound! All for you, our Ass-2-Mouth obsessed devoted viewers!
title: A2M 6
